live_updates: Our technicians have restored services in the area overnight. We thank you for your patience during this interruption.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47405.summary: Some customers in the Proper Village West area of Chilliwack are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47405.title: Mar 5 - Chilliwack (Proper Village West) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
